selectCampaignType_desc: Choose the type of campaign you want to create. A regular campaign sends a single email to your audience.
selectAudience_desc: Select who will receive this campaign. You can send to all contacts, specific lists, or dynamic segments.
designContent_desc: Design your email. Choose a template, write a compelling subject line, and set your sender details.
campaignSettings_desc: Configure your campaign settings, including tracking options and delivery optimization for better results.
reviewAndSend_desc: Review your campaign summary and choose when to send it. You can schedule it for later or send it immediately.
noVerifiedDomainError: No verified sending domain available. Please configure a domain in your account settings.
